title: Will Quince – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Will Quince, the Conservative MP for Colchester, on Twitter on 23 October 2022.
content:
Having spoken with Rishi Sunak I remain convinced that he is the right person to lead us through these challenging times and onto a brighter future.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
